summary: After a year passes since the sudden death of a child, a family gathering takes place whilst peculiar unexplainable events occur.
cast: Sienna Guillory|Gianni Capaldi|Enzo Cilenti|Michele Hicks|Eric Roberts|Karen Austin|Sonja Kinski|Heath Freeman|Patrick Muldoon|Sarah Lassez|William McNamara|Melanie Avalon|Sabrina Carmichael|Cynthia Richards|Anthony Reyes
title: The Wicked Within
